studentUnion.description: The central body representing the interests and events of the student community.

csClub.description: A hub for computer science students to innovate, learn, and collaborate on various tech projects.

intlStudentsAssoc.description: Celebrates and supports the diverse cultural background of our campus community.

ecoClub.description: Focused on promoting sustainability and environmental awareness on campus.

careerServices.description: Provides career guidance, job placement services, and networking opportunities.

healthWellness.description: Offers resources and support for physical and mental health on campus.

athleticsDept.description: Organizes sports events and maintains athletic facilities at the university.

filmSociety.description: A community for film aficionados to watch, discuss, and appreciate cinema.

businessClub.description: Encourages entrepreneurship and business skills among students.

artsCollective.description: A creative space for artists to showcase their work and engage with the arts.
